title: Kenyan police use tear gas to disperse opposition supporters
description:
(2 Oct 2017) Police in Nairobi were forced to use tear gas to disperse opposition supporters who were converging to protest against the Independent Electoral and Boundaries Commission on Monday.
The supporters want some of the officials in the electoral body to resign, claiming that the government used them to tamper with election results.


You can license this story through AP Archive: http://www.aparchive.com/metadata/youtube/48f8562aa32a3cde7baa81c6c59addfb
